channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: Trump says Americans who criticize the Supreme Court for overturning Roe v. Wade should be imprisoned.
item.source:markdown: Trump says Americans who criticize the Supreme Court for overturning Roe v. Wade should be imprisoned.

item.description: What a "critical section" is.
item.source:markdown: What a "critical section" is.

item.description: Social networks are condemned when they carry lies from race-hate, misogyny and worse, but the major news orgs do it all the time. It's ridiculous that there are two standards.
item.source:markdown: Social networks are condemned when they carry lies from race-hate, misogyny and worse, but the major news orgs do it all the time. It's ridiculous that there are two standards.

item.description: A privacy-first, no-nonsense, super-fast blogging platform.
item.source:markdown: A privacy-first, no-nonsense, super-fast blogging platform.

item.description: Putin Is Hunting Down Ordinary People All Over the World.
item.source:markdown: Putin Is Hunting Down Ordinary People All Over the World.

item.description: Why Is It Silly to Think It’s the Media’s Job to Inform the Public?
item.source:markdown: Why Is It Silly to Think It’s the Media’s Job to Inform the Public?

item.description: NC governor candidate Mark Robinson campaign staff resigns.
item.source:markdown: NC governor candidate Mark Robinson campaign staff resigns.

item.description: Dear NYT how about recording the number of times each candidate openly threatens specific races, genders, lifestyles, religions and of course individual people. Keep a page where you tally. Point to it frequently (we will).
item.source:markdown: Dear NYT how about recording the number of times each candidate openly threatens specific races, genders, lifestyles, religions and of course individual people. Keep a page where you tally. Point to it frequently (we will).

item.description: More Than 700 Current and Former National Security Officials Back Harris.
item.source:markdown: More Than 700 Current and Former National Security Officials Back Harris.

item.description: Mets owner Steve Cohen unveils renderings of Citi Field casino and park proposal in Queens.
item.source:markdown: Mets owner Steve Cohen unveils renderings of Citi Field casino and park proposal in Queens.

item.description: Open question: What are the basic capabilities of a [Bluesky's PDS] explained in terms that would be understood by a person who has run web servers and worked with RSS and OPML.
item.source:markdown: Open question: What are the basic capabilities of a [Bluesky's PDS] explained in terms that would be understood by a person who has run web servers and worked with RSS and OPML.

item.description: Throwing a wrench into the already broken wheels of our medical system is the crime. They should go to prison for doing this, the six Supreme Court justices and other Republican assholes who stick their noses where they don't belong.
item.source:markdown: Throwing a wrench into the already broken wheels of our medical system is the crime. They should go to prison for doing this, the six Supreme Court justices and other Republican assholes who stick their noses where they don't belong.

item.description: Pregnancy deaths rose by 56% in Texas after 2021 abortion ban, analysis finds.
item.source:markdown: Pregnancy deaths rose by 56% in Texas after 2021 abortion ban, analysis finds.

item.description: Trump: “If I win, you will no longer be thinking about abortion.”
item.source:markdown: Trump: “If I win, you will no longer be thinking about abortion.”

item.description: Cheney suggests conservative party split from Trump.
item.source:markdown: Cheney suggests conservative party split from Trump.

item.description: Liz Cheney says GOP needs to 'recognize what it's done.'
item.source:markdown: Liz Cheney says GOP needs to 'recognize what it's done.'

item.description: "We're not taking them from infested countries." -- hard to believe this is someone who many people feel is qualified to be president of the United States.
item.source:markdown: "We're not taking them from infested countries." -- hard to believe this is someone who many people feel is qualified to be president of the United States.

item.description: Jules Feiffer was just interviewed on NPR. He's 95 years old, and sharp as can be. Born the same year as my father, 1929 -- he died in 2009.
item.source:markdown: Jules Feiffer was just interviewed on NPR. He's 95 years old, and sharp as can be. Born the same year as my father, 1929 -- he died in 2009.

item.description: Microsoft deal would reopen Three Mile Island nuclear plant to power AI.
item.source:markdown: Microsoft deal would reopen Three Mile Island nuclear plant to power AI.

item.description: It’d be nice if there were a toolkit for Bluesky that made it easy to embed in other server apps with established and different UIs. We’ve been stuck with the twitter model since 2006.
item.source:markdown: It’d be nice if there were a toolkit for Bluesky that made it easy to embed in other server apps with established and different UIs. We’ve been stuck with the twitter model since 2006.

item.source:markdown: Unite for America Rally with Vice President Kamala Harris and Oprah Winfrey.

item.description: Cards Against Humanity sues SpaceX, alleges “invasion” of land on US/Mexico border.
item.source:markdown: Cards Against Humanity sues SpaceX, alleges “invasion” of land on US/Mexico border.

item.description: A Meticulous Accounting of How The Beatles Recorded Sgt Peppers Lonely Hearts Club Band.
item.source:markdown: A Meticulous Accounting of How The Beatles Recorded Sgt Peppers Lonely Hearts Club Band.

item.description: “Superhuman” is not a great word to describe the capabilities of ChatGPT, because it’s not human. But it has some important capabilities that humans also have, and it is far more capable than humans, so it’s not wrong, and not overhyped.
item.source:markdown: “Superhuman” is not a great word to describe the capabilities of ChatGPT, because it’s not human. But it has some important capabilities that humans also have, and it is far more capable than humans, so it’s not wrong, and not overhyped.

item.description: Trump fan featured in Biden ad admits assaulting officers with bear spray on Jan 6.
item.source:markdown: Trump fan featured in Biden ad admits assaulting officers with bear spray on Jan 6.

item.description: Etain in town of Ulster begins selling recreational cannabis, becoming third licensed dispensary in Ulster County.
item.source:markdown: Etain in town of Ulster begins selling recreational cannabis, becoming third licensed dispensary in Ulster County.

item.description: Sarah Huckabee Sanders forced us to think of her as a mom. I don't think that works out very well in her favor, probably best not to go there.
item.source:markdown: Sarah Huckabee Sanders forced us to think of her as a mom. I don't think that works out very well in her favor, probably best not to go there.

item.description: Robinson under pressure to withdraw from gubernatorial race. They don't say what the "damning news story" is.
item.source:markdown: Robinson under pressure to withdraw from gubernatorial race. They don't say what the "damning news story" is.

item.description: Jeff Jarvis nails what journalism isn't doing. They should be making clear at every step that Trump is trying to initiate a race war, and is coming close to it, and if they don't get it together soon, it'll happen without any accurate reporting in advance. That is the story.
item.source:markdown: Jeff Jarvis nails what journalism isn't doing. They should be making clear at every step that Trump is trying to initiate a race war, and is coming close to it, and if they don't get it together soon, it'll happen without any accurate reporting in advance. That is the story.

item.source:markdown: $25 Harris yard sign.

item.description: Bluesky addresses trust and safety concerns around abuse, spam, and more, but when is the second instance coming? How can they claim to be distributed?
item.source:markdown: Bluesky addresses trust and safety concerns around abuse, spam, and more, but when is the second instance coming? How can they claim to be distributed?

item.description: The Worst Magazine In America. I subscribed to the Atlantic a couple of weeks ago, because I found myself reading a lot of their stories for free and decided to use the money I was spending on the Washington Post to broaden my horizons.
item.source:markdown: The Worst Magazine In America. I subscribed to the Atlantic a couple of weeks ago, because I found myself reading a lot of their stories for free and decided to use the money I was spending on the Washington Post to broaden my horizons.

item.description: Coincidence. CSS was first proposed the same day in 1994 that I started my blog. October 10. Almost 30 years ago.
item.source:markdown: Coincidence. CSS was first proposed the same day in 1994 that I started my blog. October 10\. Almost 30 years ago.
